original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields steady at open
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields were steady at open on Thursday, dealers said.
A 01.07.2025 bond was quoted at 31.40/60 percent Wednesday, steady from 31.25/75 percent a day earlier.
A 15.09.2027 bond was quoted at 28.00/15 percent steady from 28.00/25 percent a day earlier. (Colombo/ Mar 16/2023)
